name: Jawa
body:
### Welcome to Just Another Web Application
This page is a guide to the steps outlined in my presentation on HTML5 MVC Standards using AngularJS. The steps are:
 * ng-app, data binding, and the app skeleton
 * ng-repeat with controller, app module
 * load data with $http
 * ng-view and routing with ngRoute
 * library usage - Showdown.js with btf-markdown directive
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
